Functions related to Classes¶

get_attributes(obj)¶

Returns a dictionary of all of obj’s attributes.

Parameters

obj – the object whose attributes will be returned

Returns

a dict of {attr_name: attr_value}

get_configurable_attributes(cls)¶

Returns a collection of all of configurable attributes of cls instances.

An attribute is considered configurable if any of the following conditions apply:

  • It’s a descriptor with a __set__ method

  • The class’s constructor accepts a parameter with the same name

Parameters

cls – The class whose attributes will be returned

Returns

An iterable of attribute names

get_constructor_parameters(cls)¶

Returns a list of parameters accepted by cls’s constructor.

Parameters

cls – The class whose constructor parameters to retrieve

Returns

A list of Parameter instances
